ISSUE.TITLE: We should not throw JS errors when a merchant does not have appropriate ACL permissions
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.80 If the user does not have rights to some functionality, such as viewing orders or attributes, then the corresponding grids generate alerts; instead, it is better to hide the corresponding block simply. Let's revert the new permission changes in 4.80 to the logic used in 4.70 (new permission implementation, but old logic)
